name: One eraser
description:
You have lost everything you had: your house, your job, your car... everything but a eraser. You have to do something and you decide the only reasonable thing: you will be the next UK queen. Is it even possible? At least you have always been really good with trades.

How to play: 

Click to select an item
Click to drop it. You can place it in the people's hand. If they are interested they will give you something in return.
Some objects have other objects inside of them. They will be automatically send to your inventory.
Some objects can't be traded but instead they allow you to meet other people.

 
music is not mine
